page.title: 05Two Farms in Bayford Area
page.content: The two largest farms in our survey { block are Danes Farm and Bayford Hall Farm. We interviewed the farmers in late June. { Danes Farm}was built in the late 16C. It is believed that Queen Elizabeth I may have slept there. The farm is 550 acres in size, has 1 barn and the farm has expanded over the years. It has just 2 workers, with no specialists. { Bayford Hall Farm}was built in 1900. This 200 acre farm has 4 barns. It employs 2 general workers (shared with the owner's 3 other farms), and specialised spray workers are also use when required Both farmers commented on the heavy clay soils, and saw{better drainage}as a priority for the future.
